snippet.title: Donald Trump removes Anthony Scaramucci as communications director: reports
snippet.content: US President Donald Trump has decided to remove Anthony Scaramucci from his job as communications director after just 10 days, the New York Times has reported, citing three unidentified people close to the decision. The news came hours after Mr Trump swore in a new chief of staff, retired general John Kelly. General Kelly reportedly requested his dismissal. More to come. ABC/wires
